trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static predefined text decorations.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組預先定義的靜態文字裝飾。

trans-unit.source: There are four types of text decorations: baseline, overline, strikethrough, and underline.
trans-unit.target: 文字裝飾的四種類型︰ 基準、 頂線、 刪除線及底線。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示相對於文字的文字裝飾的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") Example of text decoration types ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `textDecorationType` The type of text decoration: , , , or .
trans-unit.target: ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")文字裝飾類型的範例 # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值`textDecorationType`文字裝飾的類型︰ ， ， ，或.

trans-unit.source: More than one decoration is permitted, with values separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 將允許多個裝飾以逗號分隔的值。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify "None" to indicate no type of text decoration.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定"None"以不表示任何文字裝飾的類型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a baseline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的基準<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the location of a baseline text decoration relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的文字與基準線文字裝飾的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") Example of a baseline text decoration
trans-unit.target: ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")基準線文字裝飾的範例

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a baseline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示基準<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an overline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定頂線<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the location of an overline text decoration relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示相對於文字頂線文字裝飾的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") Example of an overline text decoration
trans-unit.target: ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")頂線文字裝飾的範例

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an overline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示頂線<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a strikethrough <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定刪除線<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the location of a strikethrough text decoration relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示刪除線文字裝飾的文字的相對的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") Example of a strikethrough text decoration
trans-unit.target: ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")刪除線文字裝飾的範例

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a strikethrough <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示刪除線<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an underline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定之底線<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the location of an underline text decoration relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示底線文字裝飾的文字的相對的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") Example of an underline text decoration By default, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> uses a <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration> object to display an underline.
trans-unit.target: ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")的底線文字裝飾，根據預設，範例<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>使用<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration>物件，以顯示底線。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify Whether a Hyperlink is Underlined](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 指定是否超連結會加上底線](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an underline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示底線<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>。
